entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
